dialog_text.verify_action: Upload more photos or delete existing photos from the database. Deleting photos can not be recovered
dialog_text.upload_message: Please take and upload facial photos
dialog_text.upload_message_note: Note: The more photos of different angles are uploaded the more efficient the facial recognition will be

error.CompreFaceErrorMessage: Unable to connect to CompreFace. Ensure the integration was correctly configured and that CompreFace is running in the background
error.teachFaceErrorMessage: Unable to learn face. Verify if the uploaded images have only a single face and make sure the face is visible
